Hero.subtitle: Web Developer
Hero.heading: Hello, my name is Lucas
Hero.desc: Brief description with insights into myself, my journey, and what I engage in professionally.

About.personal-desc: I specialize in crafting intuitive websites with cutting-edge technology like NextJS. I collaborate closely with clients to create efficient, scalable, and user-friendly solutions. Let's work together to bring your ideas to life!

MyServices.services1: Professional web design focuses on creating a seamless and enjoyable user experience. This includes easy navigation, clear call-to-action buttons, and visually appealing layouts.
MyServices.services2: With web development, the possibilities are endless. Create websites, web applications, e-commerce platforms, and more, tailored to specific needs and preferences.
MyServices.services3: Content creation is the contribution of information to any media and most especially to digital media. Content can take up the form of text, graphics, videos and in many cases audio.

Work.desc: Following projects showcases my skills and experience through examples of my work. Each project is briefly described with links to code repositories and live demos. It reflects my ability to solve complex problems, work with different technologies, and manage projects effectively.
Work.project_desc1: Fullstack official ecommerce shop where you can buy boxes :) TypeScript & NextJS 14 used. Connected with Stripe & MongoDB.
Work.project_desc2: Personal Portfolio with cool 3d animations. Built with React & Vite. EmailJS connected.
Work.project_desc3: This team project is a furniture store website, in accordance with the guidelines from the client. Used React, Redux and Bootstrap.
Work.project_desc4: Online shop where you can buy boxes :) React & NextJS 12 used. Connected with Stripe & Sanity.

Cta.subheading: Prepared to turn your ideas into reality? I'm here to help.
